xxl.core.indexStructures
Class XTree.NodeConverter

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.converters.Converter
      xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree.NodeConverter
          xxl.core.indexStructures.XTree.NodeConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Enclosing class:
XTree
public class XTree.NodeConverter
extends ORTree.NodeConverter

The instances of this class are converters to write nodes to the external storage (or any other DataOutput) or read them from it (or any other DataInput).

See Also:
Converter, Serialized Form
